column4: can anyone help me with a new installation of ubuntu plz, i used unetbootin to do the install so i could replace windows xp with ubuntu and not use a cd and im having all kinds of errors on the partitioning part
you probably have a good reason for not using a CD, but it really is the best way if you want to wipe any other OS. Guess you could plug in a spare CD drive.
well, that's sad. You should buy a couple of CD-RW at least, they come in handy at times like this.
can't you disable the raid from the BIOS? Check your motherboard manual.
